result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ga: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.orig: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach

result.ponchtml: Is ag dul i ndonaċt a ḃíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amaċFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.

result.eng: If he's still alive.
result.ga: Má bhíonn sé fós beo
result.orig: Má bhíonn sé fós beo
result.html: Má bhíonn sé fós beoIf he's still alive.

result.eng: If there is an emergency.

result.eng: We don't often see wild animals.
result.ga: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáil

result.eng: They give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ga: Tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste

result.eng: I am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ga: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat

result.eng: What do you do when you have free time?
result.ga: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agat
result.orig: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agat
result.html: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agatWhat do you do when you have free time?

result.eng: What does Aisling do when she has free time?

result.orig: Céard a dhéanann Aisling nuair a bhíonn am saor aici

result.eng: What time is the first lecture?
result.ga: Cén uair a bhíonn an chéad léacht ann

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ga: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.orig: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.html: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃíonn am agam iṫe fiú aṁáinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.eng: What else are you doing?
result.ga: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agat
result.orig: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agat
result.html: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agatWhat else are you doing?
result.ponchtml: Céard eile a ḃíonn ar bun agatWhat else are you doing?

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: Don't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.
result.ga: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach lá
result.orig: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach lá

result.ponchtml: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a ḃíonn againn gaċ láDon't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.

result.eng: I only have an antenna, therefore I only have RTÉ1, RTÉ2, and TG4 at home.
result.ga: Níl agam ach aeróg mar sin ní bhíonn ach RTÉ1 RTÉ2 agus TG4 agam sa mbaile

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
